content: अर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [इयर्ति गच्छत्यनेन, ऋ-अच्] {@--1@} Speedy, swift. {@--2@} Little. {@--3@} Going (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>). --रः {@--1@} The spoke or radius of a wheel; (°रं also); अरैः संधार्यते नाभिर्नाभौ चाराः प्रतिष्ठिताः <ls>Pt. 1. 81.</ls> {@--2@} A spoke of the timewheel; a jaina division of time. {@--3@} A corner (कोण) or angle; त्रिपंचारे पीठे <ls>Śyāmāstava.</ls> {@--4@} Moss ( शैवाल). {@--5@} = पर्पट <ab>q. v.</ab>

अरं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> [ऋ-अम्] {@--1@} Swiftly, near, at hand, present. {@--2@} Readily, fitly, suitably, so as to answer some purpose. {@--3@} Enough, sufficiently (<ab>cf.</ab> अलं); excessively.
